content:
That's a great idea! Providing care instructions will definitely help my guests take good care of their zinnias. I'll make sure to print out the instructions on small cards and place them near the potting station. I might also consider adding a few fun facts about zinnias to make it more engaging. Thanks for the suggestion!

By the way, I was thinking of setting up a small photography area near the potting station where guests can take pictures of their potted zinnias. Do you think that's a good idea?
